text: Madath Thekkepaattu Vasudevan Nair (15 July 1933 â€“ 25 December 2024), popularly known as M. T., was an Indian novelist, screenwriter and movie director. Nair was born in Kudallur, British India. He was known for his roles in Naalukettu, Randamoozham, Manju, Kaalam, Asuravithu and Iruttinte Athmavu. In 2005, he was honored with the Padma Bhushan. Nair died on 25 December 2024 at a hospital in Kozhikode, India from cardiopulmonary arrest caused by heart failure at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiopulmonary arrest Category:Indian novelists Category:Indian movie directors Category:Indian screenwriters Category:Writers from Kerala Category:Deaths from heart failure
